net.sf.jameleon.result
Interface HasChildResults

All Known Implementing Classes:
CountableDataDrivableResultContainer, CountableDataDrivableRowResult, DataDrivableResultContainer, DataDrivableRowResult, JameleonTestResultTest.CountableTestResult, MockCountableResult, MockTestResultWithChildren, SessionResult, TestCaseResult, TestResultWithChildren
public interface HasChildResults

Describes a result that can have other results
